name: Pompom & Loh
description:
Loh and Pompom have to go on an adventure
to find grandma, who hasn't returned home yet!
Help them solve puzzles and go through the forest to find their grandma.

Arows or W,A,S,D to move
Space to jump
1 to control Loh
2 to control Pompom
3 to control both

Game made with GDevelop 5 for #GdevelopGameJam2

Liluo.io: https://liluo.io/lionofsky/pompom-loh
